meta.maintenanceInstruction: KEEP THIS PLAN UP TO DATE. IT IS THE SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH. NO ESTIMATES. NO PRIORITIES. ONLY EXECUTION.
meta.answeringTheQuestionAreYouDone: **!! YOU ARE NOT DONE UNTIL EVERY SINGLE TASK IS CHECKED OFF AND VERIFIED WITH DOUBLE-CYCLE REVIEW. DO NOT STOP. EXPAND SCOPE CONTINUALLY !!**

globalAlerts.warning: TIMING DEPENDENT TESTS ARE BANNED. Use synchronization.
OUTPUT MUST BE LIMITED. Use piped tail/tee for large outputs.
STRICT SERIAL EXECUTION. Do not multitask subagents.

mandatoryDirectives.subagentPolicy: Usage of subagents is MANDATORY for execution phases to ensure isolated context and rigorous verification.
mandatoryDirectives.ruleOfTwo: Every major completion requires a HOSTILE REVIEW phase before moving to the next block.

statusSection.currentState: CRITICAL FIX COMPLETE - Compilation restored, ready for testsuite integration
statusSection.lastAction: Added AddGroup method to mockComplexEvent (logiface/mock_test.go) and islog.Event (logiface-slog/slog.go). Tests passing. Ready for next phase: testsuite integration.

sequentialTasks.description: Analyze full scope from current state to ultimate goal. Document ADR filenames. Create exhaustive task list. Write refined blueprint.json.
Run full testsuite to confirm exact pass/fail count. Identify specific failing test. Document root cause.
FIXED: TestLogger_NewEvent_ReleaseEvent/pool_reuse was failing because logiface.Logger defaults to LevelInformational, filtering Debug logs. Added WithLevel[*Event](LevelDebug) to test harnesses.

sequentialTasks.task: CRITICAL FIX: Add AddGroup method to mockComplexEvent
sequentialTasks.description: Add AddGroup(name string) bool method to mockComplexEvent in logiface/mock_test.go. Method should append mockComplexEventField{Type: 'AddGroup', Value: name} and return true. This is required because Event interface was extended with AddGroup.

sequentialTasks.task: CRITICAL FIX: Add AddGroup method to islog.Event
sequentialTasks.description: Add AddGroup(name string) bool method to Event in logiface-slog/slog.go. Return false to indicate fallback to flattened keys (slog will handle). This unblocks compilation of logiface-slog.

sequentialTasks.task: CRITICAL FIX: Verify compilation after AddGroup fixes
sequentialTasks.description: Run 'gmake build.logiface' and 'gmake build.logiface-slog' to verify all compilation errors are resolved. No compiler errors allowed.
Run testsuite again. Confirm 99,501/99,501 tests passing. No failures tolerated.
Execute 'go vet ./...' in logiface-slog directory. Zero warnings allowed.
Execute 'staticcheck ./...' in logiface-slog directory. Zero issues allowed.
Run 'go test -cover ./...' and verify coverage. Aim for 100%. Document gaps.
Write tests for any uncovered functions/branches. Achieve 100% coverage.

Review benchstat output. Identify performance regressions vs baseline.

Execute 'go test -cpuprofile' and analyze hot paths.

sequentialTasks.task: Verify inlining of hot path methods
sequentialTasks.description: Run with '-gcflags=-m' to confirm Level(), AddField(), etc. are inlined.
Verify Event and Logger struct layouts minimize padding. Optimize if needed.
Write tests for nil Logger, nil Handler, nil Event, zero-value Event. No panics.
Write test with 1000 goroutines logging concurrently. Verify thread safety.
Test with 50+ levels of nesting. Verify no stack overflow.
Test with 1MB+ log messages. Verify no buffer issues.

Check project.mk for logiface-slog grit destination mapping.

continuousVerification.policy: Run brief test set after EVERY file modification. Commit only after two contiguous verification cycles.
